Text: I like Gail Simone, so I really hope this doesn't suck.
tdurden83, you're welcome. i think it's a pretty good 1st issue. good story, good (although a bit muddy) art, interesting ideas.

sounds promising. I dug secret six, so i'll be checking this out. I know I could just google it, but if someone doesn't mind, is this a spin-off of another book, and is dc launching any other new titles soon?

it is an all-new concept, the companion series to this is called the green team, by art baltazar and franco (on another thread here, i was incorrect saying those two were leaving dc.)

http://robot6.comicbookresources.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/dc-green-team-movement-625x480.jpg

if that link works, you can see the promo art for the two series, playing up the 1%/99% economic conflict in the USA.
